0:
--------------------
Text: Soviet Unterzoegersdorf (German: "Sowjet-Unterzögersdorf" ) is a fictitious country created by the art/technology/theory group monochrom.

Triplets:<Soviet Unterzoegersdorf
2:
--------------------
Text: Soviet Unterzoegersdorf:  Unterzögersdorf is partially based on an existing village well-known to Johannes Grenzfurthner, the creator of the concept.
Triplets:<Soviet Unterzoegersdorf
3:
--------------------
Text: Soviet Unterzoegersdorf:  As a kid and teenager, Grenzfurthner spent a lot of time at his grandparents' farm in the small village of Unterzögersdorf (a cadastral municipality of Stockerau).
Triplets:<Grenzfurthner
4:
--------------------
Text: Soviet Unterzoegersdorf:  His grandparents' stories about the Naziism, WWII and the Soviet occupation in allied-occupied Austria (1945-1955) form the inspirational basis of the long-term project "Soviet Unterzoegersdorf".
Triplets:<Soviet Unterzoegersdorf
